metadata.title: CVE-2018-13846 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been found in Bento4 1.5.1-624.AP4_Mpeg2TsVideoSampleStream::WriteSample in Core/Ap4Mpeg2Ts.cpp has aheap-based buffer over-read after a call from Mp42Ts.cpp, a related issueto CVE-2018-14532.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
